name: zutron-example-reducers
description: An application demonstrating the use of Zutron with Redux-style reducers
author: goosewobbler

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:dist && pnpx shx rm -rf ./node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.clean:dist: pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./dist && pnpm dlx shx mkdir -p ./dist
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:node && pnpm run typecheck:web
scripts.build: pnpm run typecheck && electron-vite build && electron-builder
